passage.title: Having lunch
passage.paragraph: Jack is having lunch with his friend George. George is very fat. He likes good food and eats a lot of it. They sit at a table. They buy some nice things. After lunch they eat some other food. "We must go, George." Jack says. "We are here for a long time. It's three fifty now."
"We can't leave now." says George "It's time for tea."
